text: 2:2-3 Onger Akaba 34:8; Matyu 18:3; Mak 10:15; 1 Korin 3:2; 14:20; Efesus 4:15-16; Hibru 5:12-13; 6:5E fo, borir iririvim an otem bagha bar kufi. Kamaghɨra, ia Godɨn Duam ia ganɨngizir daghem baghɨva mɨtiriam ian aghɨ, bizir kuratam an itir puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra, Godɨn arazir a ia gamim, ia a gɨfo, Ekiam a bar moghɨra dera. Kamaghɨra, ia Godɨn Duamɨn daghem amɨva aghung egh Godɨn Duamɨn aven gumazir aruabar mɨn ikiam.
